---
# Basics
title: "A Modern Approach to Bayesian Multilevel Modeling of the Psychometric Function"
poster_height: "48in" # Height in inches of poster.
poster_width: "96in" # Width in inches of poster.
author:
  - name: Alex Knudson
    affil: 1
  - name: A.G. Schissler
    affil: 1
  - name: A. Scurry
    affil: 2
  - name: F. Jiang
    affil: 2
affiliation:
  - num: 1
    address: Department of Mathematics and Statistics, University of Nevada, Reno
  - num: 2
    address: Department of Psychology, University of Nevada, Reno
# Main Colour Scheme
primary_colour: "#113864"
secondary_colour: "#9da9c9"
accent_colour: "#3659b5"
# Title Box
title_textcol: "#ffffff" # Colour of title text
author_textcol: "#ffffff" # Colour of author text.
affiliation_textcol: "#ffffff" # Colour of affiliation text.
title_textsize: "84pt" # Poster title fontsize.
author_textsize: "60pt" # Author list font size.
logoleft_name:  "unr_logos/University%20Logo%20RGB_vertical_blue_reversed.png"
logoright_name: "unr_logos/University%20Logo%20RGB_vertical_blue_reversed.png"
# Poster Body
body_bgcol: "#ffffff" # Colour of the poster main background.
body_textsize: "36pt" # Size of the main poster body text.
body_textcol: "#000000" # Colour of main text in the body of poster.
column_numbers: 4 # Number of columns that the poster body has.
column_margins: "0.5in" # Margin spacing for columns.
columnline_col: "#008080" # Colour of the column line dividers.
columnline_width: "1mm" # Width of line between each column.
columnline_style: none # Style of the column line seperator.
sectitle_textcol: "#ffffff" # Colour of the poster section titles.
sectitle_textsize: "65pt" # Text size of the section titles (H1).
sectitle_bgcol: "#113864" # Colour of the section title box.
sectitle_bordercol: "#113864" # Colour of the border around the section title box.
sectitle_borderwidth: "2mm" # Thicknes of the section title box border.
sectitle_boxshape: "4mm 0mm" # Changes the shape of the section title box.
sectitle2_textcol: "#113864" # Color of 2nd level header text.
sectitle2_textsize: "40pt" # Text size of the section titles (H2).
link_col: "#0b4545" # Colour of other links within the poster.
output: 
  posterdown::posterdown_html:
    self_contained: false
bibliography: packages.bib
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```
